code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddTodo=_ref=>{let{addTodo}=_ref;const[title,setTitle]=useState("");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(title.trim()){addTodo(title);setTitle("");}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Add a new task",value:title,onChange:e=>setTitle(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Task"})]});};export default AddTodo;
